oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lebanese painters
Art Exhibitions -- Lebanon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Under the patronage of H.R.H. Princess Majda al Raed, Platform Gallery presents an exhibition of paintings by Hussein Madi, at 7 PM. 26 Sept. 1985 at Petra Bank Art Gallery. The exhibition will run for two weeks Daily except Fridays.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hussein Madi
